pr_title: enh: Text Filter waits until user finishes updating

timeline.bodyText: 1200 and 1300 feel a bit more natural to me, whereas 1500+ feels awkward. But then, the original issue was that of Regex entry into the Text Filter box, and when I test with a bit of Regex, indeed, 1500 is a good balance. Let's go with that!
timeline.author: thadguidry

replies.bodyText: So it's good to go then ?
